title: Discipline
text:
If you have a red card:

Notify the MARR president (Mike O’Brien: mikeob9@gmail.com) and the Eastern Regional Disciplinary Representative (Bryan Dewease: bdewease@gmail.com);
DO NOT review film – we do not want to referee after the match;
Complete the disciplinary report below.

All cards should be reported to the Geographic Union that is hosting the match. So, for example:

NOVA plays Schuylkill at Schuylkill: All cards to either side are reported to the Eastern Pennsylvania Rugby Union.
NOVA plays Schuylkill at NOVA: All cards to either side are reported to the Capital Rugby Union.

title: Discipline
text:
Eastern Pennsylvania Rugby Union (EPRU)
Report all incidents in an EPRU-hosted match here.
ERPU-hosted matches are those at Philadelphia Women and Schuylkill River.

title: Discipline
text:
Capital Rugby Union (CRU)
Report all incidents in a CRU-hosted here.
CRU-hosted matches are all those not hosted by Philadelphia Women or Schuylkill River.

title: Mid-Atlantic Rugby Referees
text:
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
